text: Alex Simeon Janvier (February 28, 1935 - July 10, 2024) was an aboriginal artist from Canada."Alex Janvier". The Canadian Encyclopedia. He was often called the "first Canadian aboriginal modernist". Center for Canadian Contemporary Art He was of Denesuline and Saulteaux descent. Janvier died on July 10, 2024 at the age of 89.Icon Indigenous Artist Alex Janvier Passed Away Age 89 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Canadian artists Category:First Nations people
title: Alex Janvier
